text: Injap Tower Hotel is a 21-storey residential building and hotel located in Benigno Aquino Avenue, Mandurriao, Iloilo City beside SM City Iloilo. It is the tallest building in Iloilo City since its completion in 2013. It is also the tallest in the Western Visayas region. The Horizon Café, a restaurant is situated on the top floor Injap Tower. The hotel also hosts a spa dubbed as the "Spa Circle". ==See also== * List of tallest buildings in the Philippines * List of tallest buildings in Iloilo ==References== Tallest buildings Category:Residential buildings in the Philippines Category:Residential buildings completed in 2013
title: Injap Tower Hotel
